blocks.text: Norway's Olympic Medal Rush: Three Gold Chances Sunday

The Winter Olympics deliver a jam-packed Sunday with Norway chasing medals in three disciplines. Klaebo anchors the men's relay, Granerud flies on the large hill, and Hovland wraps up his Pebble Beach campaign.
⛳ Hovland wraps up AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am final round from 06:00
Spanish football brings four fixtures including two local derbies. Atlético visit Rayo Vallecano (16:15) with top-four stakes, while Valencia-Levante (18:30) is a relegation battle.
